subject: VAM set up issues
description_text:
Good Afternoon. I recently received my VAM pedal attachments and Plus X
Pedal Control Box. When I plugged them all in with my Pro Plus Pedals I
wasn't getting any signal from anything. Can someone please help!?

Thanks,
Garrett

conversations.body_text: Hi Garrett Kinney,    After connecting the pedals, open the SIMSONN MANAGER 2.0.8 software. In the top-left corner, use the offset_setting function to perform a zero calibration, and the pedals will be ready to use.
